name: Calculate Hours PAGA Site Support and Feasibility Report
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(PAGA Site Support and Feasibility Report:<* Eval(<* Eval([IF](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Is_Site_Study_with_Feasibility_Report_require.Yes)*>){1}{0}[ENDIF]) *>*(24+(24*<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>*0.25))) *>)*>
